STI.P: REQUIREMENTS FOR THE COMMISSION’S NOTIFICATIONS SYSTEM

NP.TXT: The interface of the secure electronic notifications system shall be at least in English.
The secure electronic notifications system provided by the Commission shall be designed to:
allow the Member States to submit the same information only once, by re-using prior submitted information where appropriate;
enable the submission of information via both machine processable interfaces and human usable interfaces;
support appropriate access controls and access control management, delegating to the Member States the power to grant access to competent representatives as regards the notifications;
support notifications of the information specified in Annex II;
allow Member States to view notified information;
acknowledge receipt of notifications of information by electronic means;
retain, and allow Member States to view, a historical record of any changes in any notified information.
